Infections Included in Case/Death Estima: Healthcare-associated Infections caused by Klebsiella and E. coli with onset in hospitalized patients
Infections Not Included: Infections occurring outside of acute care hospitals (e.g. nursing homes); Infections acquired in acute care hospitals but not diagnosed until after discharge; Infections caused by Enterobacteriaceae other than Klebsiella and E. coli (e.g. Enterobacter spp.)
